name: Mailphax
description: Send faxes with Phaxio using 3rd party email services.

RECIPIENT_WHITELIST_FILE.description: File path to newline-separated list of whitelisted emails of recipients

SENDER_WHITELIST_FILE.description: File path to newline-separated list of whitelisted emails of senders

BODY_REGEX.description: Ruby Regexp string (of form '/{regex string}/{regex arguments}') to match against email body

SMTP_HOST.description: SMTP host for outgoing email (for failure alerts)

SMTP_USER.description: SMTP username for outgoing email (for failure alerts)

SMTP_PASSWORD.description: SMTP password for outgoing email (for failure alerts)

SMTP_PORT.description: SMTP port for outgoing email (for failure alerts)

SMTP_TLS.description: Should use TLS on outgoing email? (true or blank)

SMTP_FROM.description: The From address for any outgoing email from mailphax.
